opennlp.ccg.ngrams
Class LinearNgramScorerCombo

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.NgramScorer
      opennlp.ccg.ngrams.LinearNgramScorerCombo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reversible, FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
public class LinearNgramScorerCombo
extends NgramScorer
implements FeatureExtractor

Linear combination of n-gram probability models, interpolated at the word level; can also be used as a feature extractor in a perceptron model. The models must have the same direction.

Version:
$Revision: 1.17 $, $Date: 2009/06/22 04:32:47 $
Author:
Michael White

Constructor Detail

LinearNgramScorerCombo

public LinearNgramScorerCombo(NgramScorer[] models)
Creates a new linear combo model with the given component models and with the combination weights determined by the rank order centroid method. The models are assumed to be ordered from most to least important.

LinearNgramScorerCombo

public LinearNgramScorerCombo(NgramScorer[] models,
                              double[] weights)
Creates a new linear combo model with the given component models and combination weights. The weights are assumed to sum to 1, and the number of weights is assumed to match the number of models. The wordsToScore list is shared across the component models.

logProbFromNgram

protected float logProbFromNgram(int i,
                                 int order)
Returns the log prob of the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, with backoff. In particular, returns the linear combination using the established weights of the probabilities given by the component models, converted back to a log prob (base 10).

Specified by:
logProbFromNgram in class NgramScorer

incNgrams

protected void incNgrams(FeatureMap featmap,
                         int i,
                         int order)
Increments ngram counts for the ngrams starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order. The implementation delegates to the component models.

Overrides:
incNgrams in class NgramScorer

setInterpLogProb

public void setInterpLogProb(boolean useInterpLogProb)
Sets the flag for including interpolated log prob as a feature.

extractLogProbs

public FeatureVector extractLogProbs(Sign sign,
                                     boolean complete)
Returns a feature vector with the log prob features for the given sign and completeness flag. In particular, returns the log prob from each model as the value of a feature named '$ngramN'. The interpolated log prob is also returned as a feature '$ngram' if the flag for including the interpolated log prob as a feature is set (the default).

Overrides:
extractLogProbs in class NgramScorer
